mapper.select: SELECT finance_id, finance_no, sys_user_id, sys_user_name, finance_price, status, submit_time FROM deal_user_store_finance WHERE deal_store_id = #{dealStoreId} ORDER BY submit_time DESC

SELECT deal_user_store_finance.finance_id, deal_user_store_finance.finance_no, deal_user_store_finance.deal_store_id, deal_user.deal_user_id, deal_user.deal_user_name, deal_user_store_finance.contact_name, deal_user_store_finance.contact_phone, deal_user_store_finance.sex, deal_user_store_finance.sys_user_id, deal_user_store_finance.finance_price, deal_user_store_finance.status, deal_user_store_finance.submit_time FROM deal_user_store_finance AS deal_user_store_finance JOIN deal_user_store AS deal_user_store ON deal_user_store_finance.deal_store_id = deal_user_store.deal_store_id JOIN deal_user AS deal_user ON deal_user_store.deal_user_id = deal_user.deal_user_id WHERE deal_user_store_finance.finance_id = #{financeId}
